verses.verse: <S%G5620>Therefore,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1973>whom<s%> I <S%G1973>long<s%> [to see], my <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G4735>crown,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4739>stand<s%> <S%G4739>firm<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved.<s%>
I <S%G3870>urge<s%> <S%G2136>Euodia<s%> and I <S%G3870>urge<s%> <S%G4941>Syntyche<s%> to <S%G5426>live<s%> in <S%G5426>harmony<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3483>Indeed,<s%> <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G4805>comrade,<s%> I <S%G2065>ask<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4815>help<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G846>women<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have <S%G4866>shared<s%> my <S%G4866>struggle<s%> in [the cause of] the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G3326>together<s%> with <S%G2815>Clement<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of my <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>workers,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3842>always;<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> I will <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice!<s%>
Let your <S%G1933>forbearing<s%> [spirit] be <S%G1097>known<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1451>near.<s%>

Be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> for <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> but in <S%G3956>everything<s%> by <S%G4335>prayer<s%> and <S%G1162>supplication<s%> with <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> let your <S%G155>requests<s%> be <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G5242>surpasses<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3563>comprehension,<s%> shall <S%G5432>guard<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> and your <S%G3540>minds<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3062>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is <S%G227>true,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is <S%G4586>honorable,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is <S%G1342>right,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is <S%G4375>lovely,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> is of <S%G2163>good<s%> <S%G2163>repute,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G703>excellence<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G1868>worthy<s%> of <S%G1868>praise,<s%> let your <S%G3049>mind<s%> <S%G3049>dwell<s%> on <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

The <S%G3739>things<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> and <S%G3880>received<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> and <S%G3708>seen<s%> in me, <S%G4238>practice<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things;<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall be with you.

But I <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3171>greatly,<s%> that <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>last<s%> you have <S%G330>revived<s%> your <S%G5426>concern<s%> for me; <S%G2532>indeed,<s%> you were <S%G5426>concerned<s%> [before,] but you <S%G170>lacked<s%> <S%G170>opportunity.<s%>
Not that I <S%G3004>speak<s%> from <S%G5304>want;<s%> for I have <S%G3129>learned<s%> to be <S%G842>content<s%> in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1722>circumstances<s%> I <S%G1510>am.<s%>

I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G5013>get<s%> <S%G5013>along<s%> with <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G5013>means,<s%> and I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G4052>live<s%> in <S%G4052>prosperity;<s%> in <S%G3956>any<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1722>circumstance<s%> I have <S%G3453>learned<s%> the <S%G3453>secret<s%> of being <S%G5526>filled<s%> and <S%G3983>going<s%> <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of <S%G4052>having<s%> <S%G4052>abundance<s%> and <S%G5302>suffering<s%> <S%G5302>need.<s%>
I <S%G2480>can<s%> <S%G2480>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> Him who <S%G1743>strengthens<s%> me.
<S%G4133>Nevertheless,<s%> you have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> to <S%G4790>share<s%> [with me] in my <S%G2347>affliction.<s%>

And you <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3609>know,<s%> <S%G5374>Philippians,<s%> that at the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G746>preaching<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G3753>after<s%> I <S%G1831>departed<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G2841>shared<s%> with me in the <S%G3056>matter<s%> of <S%G1394>giving<s%> and <S%G3025>receiving<s%> but you <S%G3441>alone;<s%>
for <S%G2532>even<s%> in <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> you <S%G3992>sent<s%> [a gift] <S%G2532>more<s%> <S%G1364><s%> <S%G2532>than<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> for my <S%G5532>needs.<s%>
Not that I <S%G1934>seek<s%> the <S%G1390>gift<s%> itself, but I <S%G1934>seek<s%> for the <S%G2590>profit<s%> which <S%G4121>increases<s%> to your <S%G3056>account.<s%>

But I <S%G568>have<s%> <S%G568>received<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> in <S%G568>full,<s%> and <S%G4052>have<s%> an <S%G4052>abundance;<s%> I am <S%G4137>amply<s%> <S%G4137>supplied,<s%> having <S%G1209>received<s%> from <S%G1891>Epaphroditus<s%> what you have <S%G3844>sent,<s%> a <S%G2175>fragrant<s%> <S%G3744>aroma,<s%> an <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> well-pleasing to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And my <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G4137>supply<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> your <S%G5532>needs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to His <S%G4149>riches<s%> in <S%G1391>glory<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> to our <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G40>saint<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> The <S%G80>brethren<s%> who are with me <S%G782>greet<s%> you.
<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you, <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> of Caesar's <S%G3614>household.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with your <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
